/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's constant movement. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and artificial light to the urban setting.
